**Scratchpad**

* Main sections: Parties, Offer and Acceptance, Consideration, Intention to Create Legal Relations, Legality of Purpose, Certainty of Terms, Consent, Form and Formalities, Duration and Termination, Representations and Warranties, Indemnification, Dispute Resolution, Governing Law and Jurisdiction, Severability, Force Majeure, Confidentiality, Assignment and Delegation, Signatures
* Parties: Consultant (name, address), Commission (name, address)
* Consideration: Description, Value

**Reconstructed Contract Text**

CONTRACT FOR [PROJECT NAME]

This Contract ("Agreement") is entered into by and between the following parties:

* The Consultant: [Name], with an address at [Address], telephone number [Telephone], fax number [Fax], and email [Email].
* The Commission: Santa Cruz County Regional Transportation Commission (SCCRTC), with an address at 1523 Pacific Ave, Santa Cruz, CA 95060.

**ARTICLE I: OFFER AND ACCEPTANCE**

The Consultant offers to provide services to the Commission as outlined in Exhibit A: Scope of Services. The Commission accepts this offer and agrees to pay the Consultant according to the fee schedule outlined in Exhibit B: Fee Schedule.

**ARTICLE II: CONSIDERATION**

In consideration of the mutual covenants and promises contained herein, the parties agree that:

* The Commission will pay the Consultant a total of [Amount] for the services provided.
* The payment shall be made according to the terms outlined in Exhibit B: Fee Schedule.

**ARTICLE III: INTENTION TO CREATE LEGAL RELATIONS**

The parties intend to create legal and binding relations by virtue of this Agreement, which represents the entire understanding between the Consultant and the Commission. This Agreement supersedes all prior negotiations, understandings, and agreements.

**ARTICLE IV: LEGALITY OF PURPOSE**

The purpose of this Agreement is lawful and not in violation of any applicable laws or regulations.

**ARTICLE V: CERTAINTY OF TERMS**

The parties acknowledge that they have read and understood the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement. They agree to be bound by its provisions and to perform their obligations in good faith.

**ARTICLE VI: CONSENT**

This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between the Consultant and the Commission. It replaces all prior agreements, understandings, and negotiations. Each party has carefully read, understands, and agrees to be bound by this Agreement.

**ARTICLE VII: FORM AND FORMALITIES**

This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [State/Country]. The parties agree that any dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement shall be resolved through binding arbitration in [Location], according to the rules of the [Arbitration Organization].

**ARTICLE VIII: DURATION AND TERMINATION**

The term of this Agreement shall commence on [Date] and terminate on [Date]. Upon termination, all rights and obligations under this Agreement shall cease, except for any obligations that by their nature are intended to survive termination.

**ARTICLE IX: REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES**

Each party represents and warrants that:

* The information provided in this Agreement is accurate and complete.
* They have the authority to enter into this Agreement and perform their obligations.

**ARTICLE X: INDEMNIFICATION**

The Consultant shall indemnify and hold harmless the Commission, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any damages or liabilities arising out of or related to this Agreement.

**ARTICLE XI: DISPUTE RESOLUTION**

Any dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement shall be resolved through binding arbitration in [Location], according to the rules of the [Arbitration Organization].

**ARTICLE XII: GOVERNING LAW AND JURISDICTION**

This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [State/Country]. The parties agree that any dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement shall be resolved through binding arbitration in [Location], according to the rules of the [Arbitration Organization].

**ARTICLE XIII: SEVERABILITY**

If any provision of this Agreement is declared invalid or unenforceable, such invalidity or unenforceability shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision.

**ARTICLE XIV: FORCE MAJEURE**

The parties agree that they will not be liable for any failure to perform their obligations due to events beyond their control, including but not limited to acts of God, natural disasters, and government action.

**ARTICLE XV: CONFIDENTIALITY**

Each party agrees to keep confidential all information disclosed by the other party in connection with this Agreement.

**ARTICLE XVI: ASSIGNMENT AND DELEGATION**

Neither party shall assign or delegate any rights or obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.

**ARTICLE XVII: SIGNATURES**

This Agreement has been signed and accepted as of the dates indicated below:

* Consultant: [Name], with an address at [Address] (Signature) _______________________________, Date __________________________________.
* Commission: Santa Cruz County Regional Transportation Commission (SCCRTC), with an address at 1523 Pacific Ave, Santa Cruz, CA 95060 (Signature) _______________________________, Date __________________________________.

By: ________________________________________________________

This is the final reconstructed contract text.
